The openwork design ensures a lightweight and comfortable wear.
colors: Predominantly yellow gold with the dazzling white brilliance of diamonds.
occasions: Sankranthi). This versatile piece can also elevate your style for modern events and cocktail parties. A beautiful choice for a Seemantham ceremony as well.
